content: पतनं [पत्-भाबे ल्युट्] {@--1@} The act of flying or coming down, alighting, descending, throwing oneself down at. {@--2@} Setting (as of the sun). {@--3@} Going down to hell. {@--4@} Apostacy. {@--5@} Falling from dignity, virtue &c. {@--6@} Fall, decline, ruin, adversity (<ab>opp.</ab> उदय or उच्छ्राय); ग्रहाधीना नरेंद्राणामुच्छ्रायाः पतनानि च <ls>Y. 1. 308.</ls> {@--7@} Death. {@--8@} Hanging down, becoming flaccid (as breasts). {@--9@} Miscarriage. {@--10@} (In arith.) Subtraction. {@--11@} The latitude of a planet.
